sets.description: Increase volt ATK by **14.5%/16.5%/18.5%/20.5%**. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

Increase Crystamax thorn limit to **6**. Increase all elemental damage by **13%/16%/19%/22%** when a volt weapon lands an attack, lasting for **30** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
